Module gov.gsa.pivconformance.cardlib
Package gov.gsa.pivconformance.cardlib.tlv

Class TagBoundaryManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • gov.gsa.pivconformance.cardlib.tlv.TagBoundaryManager
  • public class TagBoundaryManager
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is intended to be used side-by-side SP 800-73 for quick comparison/updates to lengths. TODO: This class statically marks a tag as eligible per SP 800-73-4 table, but until the tag is obtained, we only know that it is allowed in-contecxt if the container also contains a separate signing cert. That gets determined when the container is loaded and we've determined that there is or is not a cert. Whether the tool looks for that needs to be flushed out.

      • lengthDelta

        public int lengthDelta​(java.lang.String containerOid,
                       BerTag tag,
                       int bytesLength)
                throws java.lang.NullPointerException,
                       CardClientException,
                       SoftTagBoundaryException
        Determines whether the length of the byte array corresponding to the tag falls within the length boundaries for that container
        Parameters:
        containerOid - Container OID
        tag - the element's tag
        bytesLength - computed by adding value lengths from the value length under test
        Returns:
        the difference between the prescribed lengths and the value length, hopefully all bits clear
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException
        CardClientException
        SoftTagBoundaryException
